descriptionHtml:
Name:Hair Pack 
=================
New hair style for all race(orcs,humans,elves).Now full separate version
===============================================================

Version 1.0.6

1.Add separate version
2.Full remove some hair style
3.Improved some bugs
4.Add 4 new hair style
===========================

Version 1.0.7

1.Improved alpha mask on some hair
2.reworked textures(now think more better)
3.add some new hair style
===================================

Version 1.0.7

1.Add 2 new hair style for females
2.Add 5 new hair style for males
===========================

Credits
======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to Anto from coolsims.net
Thanks to Lucha for original mod for Oblivion
http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40172
Thanks to   Caliente for help me with export
Thankst to Room207 for CCC - Comprehensive Cosmetic Compilation 
http://tes.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=24077
Also big thanks to all author whose models and textures have been used

Full Credit list read here:

http://tes.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=24077

If i\'m some one forget please let me know
===================================================

How to choose new Hair style:

Press ~(tilda) and write - SHOWRACEMENU
=====================================

Texture mod that i use for my character:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3235
===================================================

P.S. Dont forget upload your image ;)
author: newermind43
